EPiServer.GoogleAnalytics.Commerce


Installation
============

EPiServer Commerce Support for EPiServer Google Analytics adds more features to integrate and track Commerce information.
As well as normal Commerce features, basic support for Enhanced Commerce is also added.


Developer Guidelines and Samples are included in the package.

Please go to http://world.episerver.com/documentation/Items/user-guides/ 
for more topics targeted to editors and merchandisers/marketers, configuration and customization.
